title: Linux nohup command
sub_title: You process or executing shell script will get killed when logout from the session or network error occurred. You can use nohup to avoid this.

title: Minify JavaScript using uglifyjs
sub_title: UglifyJS can be used to combine and minify JavaScript assets so that they require less HTTP requests and make your site load faster.

title: Vim tips: Search and replace
sub_title: When you want to search for a string of text and replace it with another string of text, you can use the syntax :[range]s/search/replace/.

title: Basic Linux Commands
sub_title: Obtaining basic knowledge of the most common commands will help you easily execute tasks via the command line.

title: Basic Git Commands
sub_title: Here you will find a quick, high-level overview of some of the major Git commands along with short descriptions and examples.

title: Website Performance Best Practices
sub_title: I strongly recommend font-end developer to read this article: Best Practices for Speeding Up Your Web Site.
